entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
